mapper.insert: insert into profile(pId, pNickname, pGym, pAge, pHeight, pWeight, pSex, pRoutine, pDetail, pImg, pOpen) values (#{pId}, #{pNickname}, #{pGym}, #{pAge}, #{pHeight}, #{pWeight}, #{pSex}, #{pRoutine}, #{pDetail}, #{pImg}, #{pOpen})
mapper.update: update profile set pImg=#{pImg} where pId=#{pId}
